title: Do you have any podcast recommendations (preferably about philosophy or psychology)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do you have any podcast recommendations (preferably about philosophy or psychology)? Answer→ Yes…. Pretty much anything by Robert Sapolski is the first thing that pops into my head as quality foundational knowledge that's presented in a fairly unbiased manner and is pretty understandable to the Layman with a good grasp of the English language and it's etymology. He's got a whole series posted on YouTube I don't remember how many there are, basically the entire course in “human behavioral biology” below is #1 in the series. I'll try to remember to add others as they pop into my head here, but this is a good place to start.

You’d love The NonSequitur Show . It’s produced by the Great Debate Community online and centers around philosophy, debating, bold ideas and unique perspectives. Here’s the iTunes link https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/the-nonsequitur-show/id1336

I discovered Stefan Molyneux on YouTube he has a podcast website called Freedomain Radio it's excellent he covers a wide range of philosophy. His YouTube video from about nine or 10 years ago called “the story of your enslavement” was my first, I was hooked. At that point on YouTube he had about 180,000 Subscribers, now he is up to 726,735 I believe i have heard him claim, he's the world's most prolific modern-day philosopher

The surprisingly simple to understand concepts of Mr. Gilbert and his pleasant voice are enchantment to a soul that is searching!  A Ted talk is given to a live audience and a podcast is typically a more economical and wide based YouTube phenomena. Also Helen Fisher in TEDTalks is another! You will not be disappointed with either of these two ….

Try Sam Harris’ podcast “Waking Up.” This fellow is a neuroscientist and philosopher who focuses on ethics and current events. He is one of the clearest thinkers I’ve come across, and gets very interesting guests on his show. Highly recommended.
Definitely! Check out the Behind Your Behavior podcast - each episode brings on a new guest and talks about a different human behavior! Find their content [at]theBYBPodcast on instagram and twitter!
Cehck out these articles, see if they help: 35 Best Philosophy Podcasts. 7 Best Psychology Podcasts to Expand Your Mind in 2020 - Happier Human
